channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump asks appeals court to let him fire Lisa Cook before next week's Fed meeting
item.description: Trump wants the Fed to slash rates in order to spur economic growth and reduce the cost of paying the nation's debts.

item.title: Tesla’s stock keeps winning streak alive — making Elon Musk $40 billion richer
Markets didn’t know which way to go after Fed rate cut. Expect more volatility.
Bessent made mortgage claims similar to ones Trump cited to try to fire Fed's Cook: Report
item.description: Bessent has suggested that Fed Governor Lisa Cook should be removed over allegations that she committed mortgage fraud, which she denies.

item.title: U.S. stocks seesaw, Treasury yields rise as Powell discusses Fed rate cut — live
Powell, Fed officials less worried about tariff inflation, see longer path to 2%
Johnson says Democrats will 'lose that battle' if shutdown hinges on ACA subsidies
item.description: Democrats have zeroed in on health care as their central sticking point in negotiations while the threat of a government shutdown nears.

item.title: Trump pick Stephen Miran confirmed to Federal Reserve Board; will also keep White House job
item.description: Miran's fast-tracked confirmation comes as Trump has also moved to fire Fed Governor Lisa Cook from the board of the central bank.

item.title: Trump cannot fire Fed's Lisa Cook before FOMC meeting, appeals court rules
item.description: Trump's attorneys wanted a lower-court ruling, which temporarily barred Cook's firing, stayed ahead of the Fed's upcoming meeting on interest rates.

item.title: Dow ends higher, S&P 500 and Nasdaq fall as Fed rate cut triggers volatile trade
